data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Antepione Packard with description of the new genus Pionenta Ferris (Lepidoptera, Geometridae, Ennominae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ferris, Clifford D. (2010): A revision of the genus Antepione Packard with description of the new genus Pionenta Ferris (Lepidoptera, Geometridae, Ennominae). ZooKeys 71: 49-70, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.71.789, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.71.789
